code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./nav.css';import{IoMdHome}from'react-icons/io';import{LuUser}from'react-icons/lu';import{BiBook}from'react-icons/bi';import{RiServiceLine}from'react-icons/ri';import{TbMessage}from'react-icons/tb';import{FaBriefcase}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Nav=()=>{const[activeNav,setActiveNav]=useState('#');useEffect(()=>{const sections=document.querySelectorAll('section');const handleScroll=()=>{let current='#';sections.forEach(section=>{const sectionTop=section.offsetTop;const sectionHeight=section.clientHeight;if(window.scrollY>=sectionTop-sectionHeight/3){current="#".concat(section.id);}});setActiveNav(current);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",onClick:()=>setActiveNav('#'),className:activeNav==='#'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IoMdHome,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#about",onClick:()=>setActiveNav('#about'),className:activeNav==='#about'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LuUser,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#experience",onClick:()=>setActiveNav('#experience'),className:activeNav==='#experience'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BiBook,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#services",onClick:()=>setActiveNav('#services'),className:activeNav==='#services'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RiServiceLine,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#portfolio",onClick:()=>setActiveNav('#portfolio'),className:activeNav==='#portfolio'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBriefcase,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",onClick:()=>setActiveNav('#contact'),className:activeNav==='#contact'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TbMessage,{})})]});};export default Nav;
